/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with trees and bushes, adding a touch of greenery to the urban landscape. Modern apartment buildings rise on either side of the street, their red and white facades standing out against the blue sky. The sky itself is mostly clear, with only a few clouds scattered across it. The overall color palette of the image is dominated by shades of green, red, and blue, creating a vibrant and lively atmosphere.
